inscription: Titled in pencil, LC: Verdun: Defense
medium: Color drypoint, soft-ground etching, and sugarlift aquatint, with vibrograver, found letterpress photo plates, and relief rolls through stencils, and fluorescent paint sprayed through stencils on cream paper
provenance: Eugene I. Schuster; given to MIA, 1975.
signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LR: Warrington Colescott 1968
title: Verdun: Defense
